field.name: member_id
field.query: SELECT m.id as id, u.name as name FROM #__swa_member as m INNER JOIN #__users AS u ON m.user_id=u.id
field.label: User

field.name: event_ticket_id
field.query: SELECT event_ticket.id, CONCAT( event.name, ' - ' , event_ticket.name ) as event_ticket_name FROM #__swa_event_ticket AS event_ticket INNER JOIN #__swa_event AS event ON event_ticket.event_id=event.id
field.label: Event ticket
